link.title: Northmoor Elementary - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Per Governor Dewine's directive, all school buildings are closed to students. All events and extra-curriculars are cancelled. The Board of Education will meet as scheduled at the Board of Education Office.

div.label: Translate Page

div.class: hidden-xs col-sm-4 col-md-3 col-lg-3 backgroundcolor leftPanel

span.p: Northmont City Schools will be regularly sharing up-to-date information regarding the COVID-19 virus and our Remote Education Resources. Check back regularly for new information during this fluid situation.

a.strong: Remote Education Resources for Parents and Families
PBIS - Positive Behavioral Intervention and Supports
